entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Inline Rename Does Not Respect Editor Shortcuts #66166
  • Nullable value type receiver of a constrained call is unexpectedly copied #66162
  • CS1705 must indicate which library with the conflict #66161
  • CS8600 with MemberNotNullWhen in a property and using an implicit operator. #66160

Closed

  • Extract Base Class will trigger on multiple members, even if the containing class already has a base class #55610
    Backlog
  • Can't extract expression in switch expression branch. #37824
    Backlog
  • Extract method doesn't handle nullability correctly when wrapping in a task #38127
    Backlog
  • Extract Method does not reproduce nullability of generic parameters of method parameters #65456
    Backlog
  • C# Extract method selects wrong part of code #58971
    17.3
  • Extract Method: extracted block should intersect selection #13416
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow extract method in when statement #66165
    Area-IDE
  • Add tests for extract on keyword #66163
    Area-IDE
  • Prefer default over starred item #66159
    Area-IDE
  • Fix extraction inside anonymous function #66158
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix Extract Base When Class Has Base #66149
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update StreamJsonRpc #66145
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Adding support for the nullability of generic parameters of method parameters when using ExtractMethod #65925
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P3
